page.title: 18Our Survey of Langtoft
page.content: The juniors from Langtoft School are doing a survey of Langtoft.We have been split into groups.Each group has been given a list of houses to survey. On the questionnaire we were given there were two parts. Part one was all about where the people came from,what services they used and how old their house was. Part two asked what changes people had seen. Some people thought the sewers were better and some people thought electricity and pipe water was better. {Lots of people thought bus service was {worse. On the part where it asked you what ought to be changed some people said there should be a bus to Bridlington. Someone said there should be sports facilities.
